headline: Can Zebra Technologies (ZBRA) Automation Win Fulfillment Providers as Supply Chains Seek Efficiency Gains?
summary: Earlier this week, ODW Logistics announced it has adopted Zebra Technologies' Symmetry Fulfillment solution, leveraging autonomous mobile robots and workflow automation tools to optimize its e-commerce operations and transition to a pick-to-shipper model. This implementation is expected to yield a 42% improvement in pick rates while reducing shipping and material costs, highlighting accelerating adoption of advanced warehouse automation among fulfillment providers. We'll examine how ODW...
